With Palm Block technology and 1024 levels of pressure sensitivity, Surface Pen gives you a surprisingly natural way to mark-up documents and take notes in your own handwriting.","ID":4,"Image[image]":"https://az787822.vo.msecnd.net/sampleapps/productshowcase/faq4.jpg","Question":"Does the Surface Pen that works with other Surface devices?","__PowerAppsId__":"1wQUmCpaWRk"},{"Answer":"Yes, the Surface Pro 3 Power Supply will charge Surface Book through the Surface Connect port.","ID":5,"Image[image]":"https://az787822.vo.msecnd.net/sampleapps/productshowcase/faq5.jpg","Question":"Can I use the Surface Pro 3 power supply to charge Surface Book?","__PowerAppsId__":"yYz8Cq1IWgQ"},{"Answer":"Yes, when you download and install iTunes and iCloud for Windows on your Surface Book, you\u0027ll be able to download and play your iTunes music and movies, as well as transfer iCloud photos and your Safari favorites to Surface Book. ","ID":6,"Image[image]":"https://az787822.vo.msecnd.net/sampleapps/productshowcase/faq6.jpg","Question":"If I have a MacBook or iPhone, will my apps and files work with Surface Book?","__PowerAppsId__":"FmWSGExxsY4"},{"Answer":"Yes, just swipe in from the right edge of the screen, select Connect, and choose a display from the list of available ones.","ID":7,"Image[image]":"https://az787822.vo.msecnd.net/sampleapps/productshowcase/faq7.jpg","Question":"Can I connect the Surface Book to a wireless display?
